entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4 except minus 8 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 4 except minus 8 inland. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming sunny in the morning. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
